name: Assimilate (open-source)
description:
Play as an assimilation alien cloud, if your host is killed you die too.

Created for Trijam #173 in 3h 10min

Move: arrows, WASD, and another keyboard layout in respective positions.

Shoot: left mouse

Assimilate: right mouse

Source:https://github.com/nezvers/Godot_jam_games/tree/master/Trijam%20-%20Assimilate

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/AgnisNeZvers
